verbs.description: More than a century after his conviction , [V: boxing] [ARG1: great] [ARG0: Jack Johnson] , the first black man to become heavyweight champion of the world , was granted a posthumous pardon by President Donald Trump .

More than a century after his conviction , boxing great Jack Johnson , [ARG1: the first black man] to [V: become] [ARG2: heavyweight champion of the world] , was granted a posthumous pardon by President Donald Trump .

More than a century after his conviction , boxing great Jack Johnson , the first black man to become heavyweight champion of the world , [V: was] granted a posthumous pardon by President Donald Trump .

[ARGM-TMP: More than a century after his conviction] , [ARG2: boxing great Jack Johnson , the first black man to become heavyweight champion of the world ,] was [V: granted] [ARG1: a posthumous pardon] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump] .
